code:
//Nơi chứa các hàm gọi API riêng biệt cho từng module
//Module Product
import axiosService from'../../utils/AxiosService';import{API_ENDPOINT_AUTH}from'../../constants/index';import queryString from'query-string';// http://localhost:3000/products  METHOD = GET
var url='/products';//cho params 1 default value là object
export var getAllProducts=function getAllProducts(){var params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var queryParams='';if(Object.keys(params).length>0){queryParams="?".concat(queryString.stringify(params));}return axiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url).concat(queryParams));};// http://localhost:3000/products/:id  METHOD = GET
export var getDetailProduct=function getDetailProduct(productId){return axiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url,"/").concat(productId));};// http://localhost:3000/products  METHOD = POST
export var addProduct=function addProduct(data){return axiosService.post("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url),data);};// http://localhost:3000/products/:id  METHOD = PUT
export var updateProduct=function updateProduct(data,productId){return axiosService.put("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url,"/").concat(productId),data);};// http://localhost:3000/products/:id  METHOD = DELETE
export var deleteProduct=function deleteProduct(productId){return axiosService.delete("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url,"/").concat(productId));};// http://localhost:3000/products/best-seller  METHOD = GET
export var getBestSeller=function getBestSeller(){return axiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url,"/hot-sold"));};// http://localhost:3000/products/newest  METHOD = GET
export var getNewest=function getNewest(){return axiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url,"/newest"));};// http://localhost:3000/products-like?product=6069f4fa8fa8a12d34256498  METHOD = GET
export var getLikeProducts=function getLikeProducts(productId){return axiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH,"/products/like/").concat(productId));};// http://localhost:3000/products-relate?product=6069f4fa8fa8a12d34256498  METHOD = GET
export var getRelateProducts=function getRelateProducts(productId){return axiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH,"/products/relate/").concat(productId));};// http://localhost:3000/products/accessory?brand=608c1a1c99e77e244c7db4bd&limit=5&page=0&sort_p=-1
export var getAllAccessory=function getAllAccessory(){var params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var queryParams='';if(Object.keys(params).length>0){queryParams="?".concat(queryString.stringify(params));}return axiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url,"/accessory").concat(queryParams));};// http://localhost:3000/products/compare?compare=608c1b07d1dfc82f0411a8ee
export var compareProduct=function compareProduct(){var params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var queryParams='';if(Object.keys(params).length>0){queryParams="?".concat(queryString.stringify(params));}return axiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT_AUTH).concat(url,"/compare").concat(queryParams));};
